original_text: King Jehoiachin of Judah had been a prisoner in Babylon for five years. On the fifth day of the month, 3 the Lord spoke to Ezekiel, the priest. He was the son of Buzi. He was standing beside the River Kebar in Babylon. While Ezekiel was there, the Lord came to him with power.
korean_text: 여호야긴 왕이 사로잡힌 지 오 년 그 달 초닷새라

sentences.original_text: King Jehoiachin of Judah had been a prisoner in Babylon for five years.
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕 여호야긴은 바빌론에서 5년간 포로 생활을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: On the fifth day of the month,
the Lord spoke to Ezekiel, the priest.
He was the son of Buzi.
He was standing beside the River Kebar in Babylon.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바빌론의 그발 강가에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: the Lord came to him with power.
